snippet: Jamie Vardy was controversially sent off but 10-man Leicester City produced an extraordinary comeback from two down to earn a 2-2 draw while showing the spirit of champions at Stoke City on Saturday....
lead_paragraph: Jamie Vardy was controversially sent off but 10-man Leicester City produced an extraordinary comeback from two down to earn a 2-2 draw while showing the spirit of champions at Stoke City on Saturday.

headline.main: Vardy Off but Leicester Make Great Comeback to Draw 2-2
headline.print_headline: Vardy Off but Leicester Make Great Comeback to Draw 2-2
